name: Brian Roddy
overview:
Brian Roddy is currently the SVP of Engineering at Jive Software.
Brian has more than 15 years experience leading engineering teams and building market leading products.
Most recently, at Cisco he oversaw a team of over 200 engineers, building mission-critical, high-performance networking products.
Roddy joined Cisco through the acquisition of Reactivity, a leading XML gateway provider, which he co-founded in 1997.
Prior to Reactivity, he was a senior scientist at Apple.
